subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda had one of his most impressive starts in weeks, allowing two runs and four hits over six and two-thirds innings and setting down 17 batters in a row in one stretch.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda had one of his most impressive starts in weeks, allowing two runs and four hits over six and two-thirds innings and setting down 17 batters in a row in one stretch.
